text: Because of Him is a 1946 American romantic comedy movie directed by Richard Wallace and starring Deanna Durbin, Charles Laughton, Franchot Tone, Helen Broderick, Stanley Ridges, Donald Meek, Charles Halton. It was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== *Because of Him at IMDb Category:1946 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Richard Wallace
title: Because of Him
